QuestData.Title: Tailgunner!
QuestData.Description: Okay, I've softened this guy up, how about you help me finish him off?$b$bI've got a plan for our escape, but it'll require a lot of guts and a little luck.$b$bYou up for it, $n?$b$bJust follow my lead...
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the tailgun to defend the Schnottz Bomber.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work back there, $n.$b$bLooks like we've lost them, for now at least.

Objectives.Objective: Escaped the Obelisk of the Sun
